metadata.title: CVE-2020-28021 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 has Improper Neutralization of Line Delimiters. An authenticated remote SMTP client can insert newline characters into a spool file (which indirectly leads to remote code execution as root) via AUTH= in a MAIL FROM command.

notes.note: leosilva> fix is same as CVE-2020-28015

criterions.comment: exim4 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
